mapper.select: SELECT category1 , category2 , category3 , name as keyword FROM category_keyword A , (SELECT A.id , A.sort_no , A.name as category3 , B.name as category2 , C.name as category1 , concat(C.name , ' - ', B.name, ' - ', A.name) full_category FROM category A LEFT JOIN category B ON B.id = A.parent_id LEFT JOIN category C ON C.id = B.parent_id WHERE A.level = 3) B WHERE A.category_id = B.id AND A.name = #{value}
SELECT id , name , level , sort_no as sortNo , parent_id as parentId FROM category WHERE level = #{value} ORDER BY sort_no, name

SELECT id , ical_uid as iCalUid , keyword , category1 , category2 , category3 , requester , content , sr_id as srId , subsystem , created_date as createdDate , modified_date as modifiedDate FROM myevent WHERE id = #{value}

SELECT A.id , A.ical_uid as iCalUid , A.etag , A.start , A.end , A.kind , A.creator_email , A.summary , A.description , A.location , A.html_link , A.created , A.updated , keyword , category1 , category2 , category3 , requester , content , sr_id as srId , subsystem , created_date as createdDate , modified_date as modifiedDate FROM googleevent A , myevent B WHERE A.id = B.id AND ( A.start BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} OR A.end BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end})
